title: Short Term Let Hyde Park Studio With Terrace Overlooking Garden
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


This is a fully-furnished spacious high ceiling self-contained studio with separate well-equipped kitchen and bathroom and a private terrace with a beautiful tranquil garden view It is on the first floor accessible by stairs and lifts It is in central London about 5 minutes walk to Hyde Park and 10 mins walk to Notting Hill Gate and Paddington It has high-speed fiber Sky Broadband Short term let from 14/1/21 to 20/1/21 Only £ 260 per week inclusive of all bills Deposit £ 50
